title: Person with Crown
description:
A person wearing a crown.

ðŸ‘¸ Princess and ðŸ¤´ Prince were added in 2015 and 2016, respectively. Person With Crown was created to represent royalty without being overly specific about gender.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person with a crown emoji embodies regal authority and prestige, depicted with a serene expression and a gleaming golden crown. The crown itself is rendered with exquisite detail, featuring polished facets and realistic light reflections that highlight its precious material, a hallmark of Apple's 3D design. This emoji signifies royalty, power, achievement, or a sense of being the best, exuding a sophisticated aura fitting for any distinguished digital communication.
